website_summaries.verdict: Great for travel, this unit is regarded as highly durable and reliable by most owners.
cons: Occasional issues with the base cracking

customer_reviews.title: Big Problem with Clips
customer_reviews.text: Six of the clips fell apart when I opened them for the first time - preventing me from using the product. Cannot imagine how this problem got past quality control.
customer_reviews.author: LandofEnchantment

customer_reviews.title: Warped once they heated up!
customer_reviews.text: These hot so hot that they melt d and warped. Very disappointing for how much I paid for them :(
customer_reviews.author: Anne Morton

customer_reviews.title: Love hate relationship
customer_reviews.text: These rollers are extremely hot even in the lower setting. They wrapped almost immediately. About 4 months in one of the heating posts quit working. Had to purchase extra clips because they kept breaking. I really love what they do for my hair but the expense is high and the quality is not in the product.
customer_reviews.author: beau

customer_reviews.title: and this one works the best. 8 rollers
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I have tried different brands, and this one works the best. 8 rollers, could use two more to cover my whole head.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Best curlers I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Have used some form of hot rollers since 1970. Just love the results. Nice curl with ease of use. Especially like that you can purchase extra curlers in the exact size necessary for length of hair. I use 6 additional curlers and the “second” round heats up fast. As soon as I use the first curler I add the second for heating immediately. They heat up so fast for my additional 6. Probably leave in 5 minutes. That’s all it takes for a perfect curl!!!!!I I will say the clips are bad. I throw them away and use a similar clip that’s white from a different company. But that’s a small inconvenience for a great set of curlers.
customer_reviews.author: Anita B.

customer_reviews.title: Too hot to handle!
customer_reviews.text: Much much too hot to the touch so very difficult to use!
customer_reviews.author: vsm

customer_reviews.title: Don't travel with them!
customer_reviews.text: These are advertised as handling direct current as well as alternating. But I took them to England with me and they started to smoke and then quit working. I am going to try to get my money reimbursed.
customer_reviews.author: wl

customer_reviews.title: Gets really hot, really fast!
customer_reviews.text: These curlers are almost too hot, the only reason I didn't give 5 stars is the price...are any electric curlers really worth this? I do like them because they heat quickly, have 2 heat settings and can be used for foreign travel. I ordered extra rollers and pop them on to heat while I'm rolling my hair, wait a minute or two and by then the additional ones are ready (8 rollers are not enough for thick long hair)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clips are flimsy and not replaceable.
customer_reviews.text: As well as the rollers heated up (to very hot), the clips are worthless. Four out of eight fell apart the first time I used this thing. There don't seem to be any replacements available anywhere. Purchasers (of other products) should make sure they can get extra clips before buying another model.
customer_reviews.author: pbw

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They burn my fingers when rolling my hair and they don't make my hair curl...
customer_reviews.author: M. J.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love my hot rollers...be careful...they get very hot...but they work great
customer_reviews.author: Susan Campisi

customer_reviews.title: Magic! work so good but a lil too bulcky for traveling (for me at least)
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, they work and do what they are supposed to. The box is a little too big for me and I wasn't so clear on the instructions. But when I put them on my hair and took them off, I felt as if I had just left the salon! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Bacchus J.

customer_reviews.title: I liked it better than the Dyson Air Wrap!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the T3 Hot Rollers! I spent a lot of money on the Dyson Air Wrap and think that these rollers work way better. I feel that Dyson was good for not so much heat to your hair but the T3 gives your hair volume and it is way easier and faster. The results come out better too.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Tune

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: These rollers are good and heat up really fast. They curl nicely but don’t hold the curl in thick hair. I have thick hair and my hair are very easy to curl still my hair stayed curled for only a few hours. I’m returning these. There is nothing special in them for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Irum

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not hit enough for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I gave these a star because they are very pretty and compact. My set never really heated up to super hot. My hair is past my shoulders and the big roller was just too big. My curl held for less than an hour. I ordered another brand set and they are sooo much better at close to the same cost. I have many other T3 products that are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: They seem sturdier that the older model. I wish ...
customer_reviews.text: They seem sturdier that the older model. I wish that they automatically were on when you plug them into the socket, instead of having to turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought these in august and loved them and now they don't work anymore
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in august and loved them and now they don't work anymore. The heating element is out . They are so expensive for curlers and the quality is not there.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda S.

customer_reviews.title: The set looks beautiful and heats up quickly
customer_reviews.text: The set looks beautiful and heats up quickly, however, the clips don't hold my hair in tight at all, which results in kinks. The hair came out more frizzy as well. I'll stick to my heated Amika curling brush. I've read great reviews on T3 other products. I may try another one, as this one doesn't get rated well.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Ray

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaint about the quality of the product but it seems to be overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: happy and looking good
customer_reviews.text: These rollers heat up quickly and are easy to use. They give my hair that "salon finish".... and it lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: chezcherielle

customer_reviews.title: Getting hot quick.
customer_reviews.text: Best rollers I have ever used and I have been using hot rollers for many years. Wish they had some metal pins to go with them though. I have the small and mediocre size. Anyone know what size universal pins I could use. Then on air Lin’s do not fit the middle size.
customer_reviews.author: Mwp

customer_reviews.title: I would like to contact vendor to get free replacements but there ...
customer_reviews.text: Two of the hair clips broke immediately. I would like to contact vendor to get free replacements but there is no information about how to deal with a faulty product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kepner

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate heat
customer_reviews.text: Terrible rollers, Unable to get hot enough, would have returned but had a short return time frame. If you have thin hair they will not stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked on ONE trip, then one of the 8 rollers quit working. I have owned the rollers 3 months and although Amazon support said they would be replaced, the company said NO. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT. Wish I had read previous reviews before I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyJamba

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste  your money
customer_reviews.text: Big mistake buying this. The rollers don't have enough heat, they don't stay in without crinkling the hair. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Riley

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must have!!
customer_reviews.text: These rollers an absolute necessity and must have!!! Amazing quality and results. Love these rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Leaves kinks in your hair. Curlers get too hot to handle sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: AH-MAZING
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love!! Hair looks amazing! Curls hold longer! Suffice it to say, I am content with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jhoanne

customer_reviews.title: These rollers don’t burn your fingers but get hot enough to do the job!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Love the felt on them.. easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Therese Romanelli

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The best rollers I've ever used. A little pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Corrine

customer_reviews.title: Love these rollers!
customer_reviews.text: Makes great curls and heats up fast! Love them, wish I would have bought them sooner
customer_reviews.author: Linda burton

customer_reviews.title: two broke and the metal fell out burning my arm pretty badly. The new ones have a rubber edging
customer_reviews.text: Have the older version of these rollers that had plastic edges. They are heavy and can fall out of your hair if not secured properly. Consequently, two broke and the metal fell out burning my arm pretty badly. The new ones have a rubber edging. I'm hoping this will resolve the problem that the older version presented. But these rollers get very hot and produce in very nice girl. Much superior to other brands I have tried. I have used hot rollers since I was a teenager.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa H.

customer_reviews.title: This set of rollers died after a year
customer_reviews.text: I liked these rollers, but they stopped working after using them for a year. I didn't use them very much either. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Takes longer to heat up then advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good so far. I lost my older set and decided to purchase again. I lost the volume after a couple hours (I didnt use hair spray) but the immediate look was great. It also takes over 5-6 minutes to fully heat up not 3 like they advertised. I guess to most that's not an issue but I wake up in the morning with 20 minutes to get ready and have breakfast and leave so any minutes counts. Ill update if anything changes
customer_reviews.author: Brittany RR

customer_reviews.title: however like many other reviews
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing wrong with the quality of the product, however like many other reviews, the rim of the rollers got very hot after pre-heating was complete, and that's not something that I would've expected from a product that costed almost $100. The foamy roller surface also made my hair very frizzy. Product was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great volume, curls hold with use hair spray, non humid environment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do not work that great. Pretty disappointing
customer_reviews.text: For the money. They do not work that great. Pretty disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Kim D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best hot rollers - quick to heat up and gets v hit
customer_reviews.author: Vinita Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: While the rollers are great, the springs on 7/8 clips sprung out while ...
customer_reviews.text: While the rollers are great, the springs on 7/8 clips sprung out while on my head, breaking the clip, so I can no longer use these rollers. Also, no way to buy replacement clips?!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice rollers!
customer_reviews.text: I like the curlers but they get alittle too hot for my head! Also need to try different clips. Over all, they work pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

product_meta.title: T3 - Volumizing Hot Rollers LUXE | Premium Hair Curler Set for Long Lasting Volume, Body & Shine | Set of 8 - 4 XL (1.75") & 4 Large (1.5”)
product_meta.description:
T3 - Volumizing Hot Rollers LUXE (1.75” & 1.5”)
Sensational volume, body & shine. All rolled into one.

Our newly enhanced roller set delivers incomparable volume, body, and shine. Powered by advanced T3 HeatCore Technology, equipped with dual temperature settings for all hair types, each roller ensures optimal heat transfer for long-lasting results. Tip: To maximize hold, ensure the hair sections are appropriate for the selected roller size. Selection will vary based on the length and thickness of hair. 

Get your glamour styling on a roll.

T3 HeatCore Technology
Embedded in each roller is a ceramic PTC heater and aluminum core that work together to reach and retain the perfect styling temperature, fast. Their advanced technology transfers heat evenly and reliably to your hair, creating lasting volume, superb body and shine like never before.

Velvet Flocking
Imparts shine and elegantly grips with no tangles, catches or fly-aways.

CoolGrip
Insulated elastomer rim makes handling and wrapping a breeze.

Lightweight Design
Ensures a truly effortless styling experience.

Auto World Voltage (100-240V)
Allows for use around the world (plug adapter needed).

2 Heat Settings
Ensure optimum, long-lasting volume and shine across all hair types.

8 Crease-Free Clips
Smart design holds rollers firmly in place while preventing unwanted creases.

1 Hour Auto-Off
Automatically turns off after 1 hour for worry-free styling.

Includes

 * 4 XL (1.75") and 4 Lg (1.5") flocked rollers with charging base
 * 8 crease-free clips
 * Luxurious storage case

Suitable for shoulder length or longer hair.

This appliance contains a special electronic circuit that automatically converts it for worldwide usage – from 100 to 240 volts AC 50/60 Hz. Just plug into a local outlet and use it as normal; the tool will automatically adjust to the local current. You may need a plug adapter to accommodate the electrical outlet of the country you are visiting

BRAND STORY
T3 revolutionizes hairstyling with innovative technology and custom crafted hair tools that create shiny, healthy hair. From dryers to styling irons, T3 is the tools of choice for celebrity hair stylists and beauty addicts alike.
